titleStmt.title: The history of Poland. vol. 2 in several letters to persons of quality, giving an account of the antient and present state of that kingdom, historical, geographical, physical, political and ecclesiastical ... : with sculptures, and a new map after the best geographers : with several letters relating to physick / by Bern. Connor ... who, in his travels in that country, collected these memoirs from the best authors and his own observations ; publish'd by the care and assistance of Mr. Savage.
titleStmt.author: Connor, Bernard, 1666?-1698.
Savage, John, 1673-1747.

biblFull.extent: 2 v., [2] leaves of plates : ill., 1 folded map, ports.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.D. for Dan Brown ... and A. Roper ...,

notesStmt.note: Vol. 2, with the exception of letter I, is by John Savage.
Imprint of v. 2 varies: London : Printed for Dan. Brown, and A. Roper and T. Leigh, 1698.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
Miscellaneous letters of the author relating to "physik" at the end of v. 1.
